DOC.brief_summary: Compare Efficacy Safety Metformin/Rosuvastatin Combination Therapy With Metformin Rosuvastatin Monotherapy Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Dyslipidemia
DOC.brief_title: Metformin/Rosuvastatin Combination Therapy With Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Dyslipidemia
DOC.detailed_description: Multi-center , Randomized , Double-blind , Phase III clinical trial
DOC.criteria: Over 19 year Type II DM Dyslipidemia 6.5 % ≤ HbA1c < 11 % Triglyceride < 350mg/dL 100mg/dL ≤ LDLC ≤ 250mg/dL FPG ≤ 270mg/dL Type I DM Unstable angina , MI , Stroke , CABG 6 month screen SBP ≥ 180mmHg , DBP ≥ 110mmHg TSH > UNL Heart failure ( NYHA class III/IV ) Serum Creatinine > UNL CLCr < 60 mL/min CK ≥ 2x UNL HIV positive BMI > 40 kg/m^2
